original_text: For, behold, the darkness shall cover the earth, and gross darkness the people: but the Lord shall arise upon thee, and his glory shall be seen upon thee.
korean_text: 보라 어둠이 땅을 덮을 것이며 캄캄함이 만민을 가리려니와 오직 여호와께서 네 위에 임하실 것이며 그의 영광이 네 위에 나타나리니

sentences.original_text: the darkness shall cover the earth,
but the Lord shall arise upon thee,
and his glory shall be seen upon thee.
